usa.title: Plumbing Trends Across the USA | Regional Insights
usa.description: Explore state-by-state plumbing trends—frost-line depths, drought restrictions, water-hardness considerations, seismic bracing, and permit/code requirements—across the U.S. Get location-specific tips for maintenance, repairs, and upgrades from Michaels Plumbing Services.

roof-types.title: Learn About Common Plumbing Systems & Their Uses
roof-types.description: Learn how potable water supply, drain-waste-vent (DWV), gas piping, and hydronic heating systems work, plus when to choose fixtures like tankless water heaters, low-flow toilets, backflow preventers, and sump pumps for homes and businesses.

roof-materials.title: Find the Best Plumbing Materials for Your Home
roof-materials.description: Compare PEX, copper, PVC, CPVC, and cast iron for supply and drain lines. See pros/cons on durability, cost, freeze resistance, corrosion, water quality, and code compliance to choose the right material for your next plumbing project.
